entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 5 May 2023
